des:
Before you can connect Alexa with Smartmi smart devices,you need to follow these steps
1. Download "Mi Home" app from Google play or App Store
2. Sign up or sign in with your Xiaomi account
3. Setup the device with your "Mi Home" app, and make sure you can control it in the app
4. Open Alexa app, search "Sartmi Family" skill and enable it by signing in with the same ID you used in "Mi Home" app
5. After the setup is finished, you can control the device with alexa
Devices compatible with Alexa: Smartmi Fan, Smartmi AirPurifier, Smartmi Humidifier, Smartmi Heater
